ideaBody: The backend is a mess. Spaghetti code everywhere. Let's rewrite it from scratch in Go.
projectContext: Legacy PHP monolith with 200K+ lines of code

ideaBody: We need real-time updates throughout the app - live notifications, real-time chat, collaborative editing, live dashboards.
projectContext: Traditional request-response web app with REST API

ideaBody: We need iOS and Android apps. Should have all the features of the web app plus push notifications and offline mode.
We need a complete design system with all components, documentation, Figma library, accessibility guidelines, theming, and a Storybook setup.
projectContext: React app with ad-hoc styled components

ideaBody: We need to support multiple organizations with isolated data, custom domains, separate billing, and org-level admin panels.
projectContext: Single-tenant SaaS app with shared database

ideaBody: Turn our app into a marketplace where third-party developers can sell plugins, themes, and integrations. Need review process, payments, analytics for sellers.
Our monolith is too big. Let's break it into microservices - auth service, user service, billing service, notification service, analytics service.
projectContext: Node.js monolith handling all business logic

ideaBody: We need to become SOC 2 compliant and GDPR ready. This involves audit logging, data encryption, access controls, privacy controls, right to be forgotten, DPA, and security policies.
projectContext: SaaS serving enterprise customers, no compliance framework

ideaBody: Replace Google Analytics with our own analytics platform. Event tracking, funnels, cohort analysis, real-time dashboards, A/B testing, user segmentation.
projectContext: Web app currently using GA4 for basic analytics

ideaBody: Partners want to resell our product under their own brand. Need custom domains, theming, logos, email templates, custom onboarding, and separate billing.
